warning.en: Wordy won't be able and is not responsible to recover the password because Wordy does not store your password key.
warning.ko: 사용자님의 패스워드를 저장하지 않음으로, 비밀번호 분실시 복구가 불가능함을 알려드립니다.

doYouAgree.en: If you agree, type the following
doYouAgree.ja: 同意の上、以下の内容を記入してください

whySoMuchTime.en: We can only check if your input is correct or not because wordy does not store your password data.

howItWorks.en: If you change your password, any data that you encrypted with your password will be decrpyted first, then encrpyted with the new password internally
